title: Home Control Signs Memorandum of Understanding with NTU Singapore to Explore AIoT Home Healthcare Ecosystem
description: HONG KONG, Jan. 27, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Home Control International Limited ('Home Control' or the 'Company', together with its subsidiaries, the 'Group'; Stock Code: 1747.HK) is pleased to announce that it has entered into a Strategic Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Nanyang Technological University, Singapore ('NTU Singapore'). The parties will negotiate and explore the possibility of cooperation and collaboration on Artificial Intelligence of Things ('AIoT') enabled home healthcare solutions, marking a significant milestone in the Group's strategic expansion into the AIoT home healthcare sector.
content: HONG KONG, Jan. 27, 2026 /PRNewswire/ -- Home Control International Limited ("Home Control" or the "Company", together with its subsidiaries, the "Group"; Stock Code: 1747.HK) is pleased to announce that it has entered into a Strategic Memorandum of ... [6696 chars]

title: Carrier Connect Data Solutions targets AI-driven growth through data centre consolidation

title: The pattern seeker: How Marcus du Sautoy finds mathematics in everything-from Shakespeare to football
description: Mathematician Marcus du Sautoy traces the hidden patterns linking Shakespeare, symmetry, artificial intelligence, and football, arguing that mathematics is not cold calculation but the quiet engine of creativity, beauty, and human perception.
content:
This conviction guides him as he moves between worlds—from lecturing on zeta functions at Oxford to discussing choreography with dancers in Birmingham. His mission is to reveal the patterns that connect them.
